text: related to this, is there a way to pass URL params to the meetings widget on an external website? E.g., <http://www.url.com?email=bnonn@bnonn.com|www.url.com?email=bnonn@bnonn.com>. I have tried this but it doesn't auto-populate into the widget
I have also tried adding the URL params to the embed code itself, both with and without `?embed=true` and none of that works either
i think HubSpot meetings cannot be customized wrt. branding or personalization at all but there is no clear document to prove otherwise
there doesn't seem to be any documentation at all
